content.rendered:
Did you know that as of January 1st, 2014, the Government of Canada has implemented a phase out of incandescent light bulbs?  What does this mean for you?  Mr. Janitorial Supplies can help you source alternate compact fluorescent or LED bulbs to conform to the new government rules.
Check out this link for additional information:
https://www.nrcan.gc.ca/energy/regulations-codes-standards/7281#a
